ComicInfo.Title: Between Heaven & Hell
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Death is ever a woman of contradictions, and with good reason. The Blood of Heaven & Hell runs through her veins. In this, the collected version of her second mini-series, the saga of the ravishing seductress of The Netherworld continues.
Since Lady Death conquered Lucifer, the Father of Lies, she's ruled Hell with an iron fist for over 400 years. But the mental manipulations of the sensual and vampiric PURGATORI, reveal that Lady Death was just his pawn. Learning the whole truth of her tortured past—and Lucifer's role in it—Lady Death surrenders to the darkness and becomes the voracious Lady Demon. The explosive finale—where Lady Death battles Lucifer—is played on a grand, epic scale and unlocks her true destiny for once and for all.
Notes:
An all reprint trade paperback reprinting Lady Death: Between Heaven and Hell.
